data.text:
On July 21, in cooperation with Da Nang authorities, Vietnam Airlines operated 3 flights to bring more than 600 people from Ho Chi Minh City back home to Da Nang.

#VietnamAirlines #4StarAirline #4Stars4You #COVID19 https://t.co/DfG78WWs8r

Vietnam Airlines has reopened international flights connecting Vietnam with Japan, Australia, England and Korea from July to September 2021. Check out our international flight schedule at https://t.co/JC2bwUR35M.
 
#VietnamAirlines #4StarAirline #4Stars4You #InternationalFlights https://t.co/ExKeVRCfzG

entity.name: COVID-19: Latest news updates from around the world
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

data.text:
Vietnam Airlines’ domestic passenger throughput grows despite COVID-19
VNA has carried nearly 40,000 passengers on domestic routes since the beginning of 2020, an annual increase of 12 per cent. VNA currently operates more than 40 domestic routes with close to 200 flights a day.

VIETNAM AIRLINES CONDUCTS FIRST ROUTINE INTERNATIONAL FLIGHT SINCE PANDEMIC

For the first time in six months, Vietnam Airlines' first routine international commercial flight took off from Hanoi on September 19 morning, heading to Japan.

#VietnamAirlines #4StarAirline

VIETNAM AIRLINES  TO RESUME SCHEDULED INTERNATIONAL FLIGHTS

Link: https://t.co/B06gMTKGic.

#VietnamAirlines #4StarAirline #4Stars4You #Vietnam #InternationalFlights
